articles.author: Carly Cassella
articles.title: Ancient Cave Artists May Have Knowingly Deprived Themselves of Oxygen to Paint - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Some of the oldest human art in Europe is entirely hidden from sight, tucked away in the narrow crawl spaces of deep, dark, and winding caves.
articles.content:
Some of the oldest human art in Europe is entirely hidden from sight, tucked away in the narrow crawl spaces of deep, dark, and winding caves.

articles.title: 'Strong association' between AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine and rare blood clots, regulator says - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: European medicines regulator said that unusual blood clots should be listed as a very rare side effect of the vaccine – but left it up to national health agencies to decide whether it should be restricted to specific age groups
